sentences.english: The crown is decorated with a stunning black onyx cabochon.
sentences.chinese: 錶冠以一顆華麗的凸圓形黑縞瑪瑙裝飾。

sentences.english: It now features Onyx Nubuck leather highlighted in orange.
sentences.chinese: 現在它的功能瑪瑙磨砂皮革中強調橙色。

sentences.english: Did he take away the jade bracelets and agate necklace i gave you last week ?
sentences.chinese: 他有沒有拿走上個禮拜我給你的玉鐲子和瑪瑙項鍊？

sentences.english: A large press, inlaid with agate and lapis-lazuli, filled one.
sentences.chinese: 一個鑲嵌着瑪瑙和琉璃的大衣櫃佔滿了牆的一角。

sentences.english: Onyx stones, and stones to be set in the ephod, and in the breastplate.
sentences.chinese: 紅瑪瑙與別樣的寶石，可以鑲嵌在以弗得和胸牌上。

sentences.english: Creamy agate snuff bottle with two small ears on the shoulder.
sentences.chinese: 紫羅蘭色瑪瑙鼻菸壺，肩上小耳。

sentences.english: and onyx stones and other gems to be mounted on the ephod and breastpiece.
sentences.chinese: 紅瑪瑙與別樣的寶石，可以鑲嵌在以弗得和胸牌上。

sentences.english: Being designed with agate cushion, the sensitivity and accuracy of balances will be guarantied .
sentences.chinese: 採用瑪瑙刀座，保證了天平的靈敏度和準確性。

sentences.english: Certain hides with a satin finish are smoothed by a rotating agate stone.
sentences.chinese: 用瑪瑙石在皮革表面旋轉打磨，使其表面光滑亮麗。

sentences.english: The flight lasted four hours from São Paulo to Manaus.
sentences.chinese: 從聖保羅到瑪瑙斯的航程約四個個小時。

sentences.english: Agate is a microcrystalline variety of quartz (silica), characterised by its fineness of grain and brightness of color.
sentences.chinese: 瑪瑙是一種微晶石英類礦物，紋理細膩，色彩豐富。

sentences.english: Then red-orange Carnelian is for you.
sentences.chinese: 然後，橙紅色瑪瑙是給你的。

sentences.english: It is round, like the size of a small yellow agate.
sentences.chinese: 它是圓的，大小很像一個小的黃色的瑪瑙。

sentences.english: An ancient game of India similar to backgammon that uses cowrie shells instead of dice.
sentences.chinese: 戲，類似於十五子棋，但用瑪瑙貝代替骰子。

sentences.english: The first-class Yu-hua-shi is a kind of agate.
sentences.chinese: 上等的雨花石是一種瑪瑙。

sentences.english: The agate lamp within thy hand!
sentences.chinese: 瑪瑙的亮燈擎在你手裏。

definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
(of sb or sth) whole or entire body
